repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.7

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir pipenv
WORKDIR /usr/src/app
COPY Pipfile* ./
RUN pipenv install --system --deploy

COPY . .

CMD pipenv run gunicorn --bind :$PORT polls.wsgi --log-file -
